message.content:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
Dear [Client],

Re: Unresolved Customer Grievance Reference

We appreciate your continued patience and understanding as we work to resolve the outstanding issues related to your account. After conducting a thorough review of the matter, we regret to inform you that the issue has been escalated to our [Designated Department] team for further investigation.

The [Designated Department] team will conduct a comprehensive review of the matter, gathering additional information and evidence to better understand the root cause of the issue. We will keep you updated on the progress of their investigation and will notify you once a resolution has been reached.

In the meantime, please feel free to reach out to us if you have any questions or concerns. We appreciate your cooperation and understanding in this matter.

Thank you for choosing [Company Name].

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
Senior Customer Service Representative
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
